Summary: Saw a gray blimp shaped object move accross the night sky but too fast to be a blimp and without sound or lights.
divs: sighting detailson june 4th, 1993 just north of atlanta, a full lunar eclipse was taking place. i was laying on my driveway with a friend watching the event. it was a clear night with no clouds. we had been outside about an hour so our eyes were well adjusted to the dark. once the total eclipse was in place, i started seeing the most colorful and awesome shooting stars i have ever seen. red, green, blue, yellow and white shooting stars. i have watched many major meteor shower events but they didn't even compare to the ones i saw during this lunar eclipse. and i was just north of a major city so i wasn't expecting to see any as the city lights were all around me. while pointing at each shooting star i saw, about 5 to 20 seconds apart from one to the other, i caught something moving in my view and pointed to it saying "there's another one". but once i focused on it, it was not a shooting star. it was a dark gray blimp or eye shaped object moving pretty fast across the sky. way too fast to be a blimp or an air plane. this object had no lights what so ever and made no sound. it was barely noticeable as it were dark gray but having 20\10 vision i picked it up with ease. i followed it across the sky with my finger from left to right, (north to south) in my field of view and then it was gone. if you were to extend your arm while holding a quarter dollar against the sky, that would be about the size of the object i saw. the whole event lasted about 15 seconds across the sky. i have seen hundreds of satellites before and they are small and bright and easy to explain. this however was not easy to explain. i live north of the busiest airport in the world and close to dobbins air force base and can tell you exactly what kind of plane is flying above my head. i know and love my airplanes. i know the holding patterns they fly in and everything. whatever i saw it was very strange. i have never seen anything like it before or since. if it were not for the blocked out moon i probably would have not seen it. i wonder how many other ufo's are reported during lunar or solar eclipses? i will never forget it. i can replay the even in my mind as if it were yesterday.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around June 4th 1993
